explanation: [0-0] A man in a blue plaid shirt is kneeling beside a sand-covered track, holding a blue remote-controlled truck. The truck is towing a white weight connected by a white hose. Many spectators are standing around the track, watching the competition.
[0-7] The man then releases his hand, and the remote-controlled truck moves forward slowly on the track. It gradually comes to a stop ahead.

[7-14] Then the shot cuts to a red remote-controlled truck, also towing a weight with a white hose attached. At the starting point, a person in a green shirt and blue jeans is kneeling on the ground, while the man in the blue plaid shirt picks up a wooden board from the track. The truck moves forward quickly on the track, kicking up dust, but also stops where the blue truck stopped.
